lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.

While having a soda at ${loverName}'s house, the phone rings. He picks it up and looks around the room nervously. He walks out of the room with the phone, and you think you can hear him say, "I TOLD you not to call me at home." He puts the
phone back down and proceeds as if it had never rung.
You casually ask who it was. His voice cracks as he says, "No one." His eyes dart around the room. How do you feel about this?
Will you keep pressing him for information until he finally tells you who was calling?
